name: Cyberbug (Kafele Palmer-Hunt)
description:
This game was created for the Game Off 2021 Game Jam, though wasn't submitted.  Roughly took 15 days to make (48 hours).  Created in Gamemaker Studio 2.

The aim of the game is to click and destroy cybernetic "bugs" on the screen with the mouse . The more bugs the player clicks, the higher the score. Consecutive clicks on bugs will increase the combo multiplier, which further increases the score.  With each score boundary, the game level increases. The higher the level, the faster the bugs move. The time limit is set to 60 seconds, though can change if the player clicks on random time powerups that appear in the level.
